TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，从 "源" 切换到 "设计视图" 时，将分析描述控件的标记源代码， 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本，即 "占位符"。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，设计时控件（其中包含属性在 " **属性** " 网格中的值）将持久保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑为网页的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何扩展 该类。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二个示例演示如何派生类的副本 并将其与设计器相关联。The second demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with a designer. 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 该类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 此代码会在设计图面上更改表示控件的占位符，并将属性添加到 " **属性** " 网格。The code alters the placeholder that represents the control on the design surface and adds a property to the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何派生类的副本 并将其与前面示例中定义的设计器相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with the designer that was defined in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#2)]

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在为 设计图面上的关联控件创建占位符时，在内部构造类的新实例 。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates a placeholder for the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 实现设计器属性，以便隐藏关联控件的 属性。

span.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含与 关联的数据文件的名称和路径。

span.span: A that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设计器中的属性设置为包含要用于关联控件的 Microsoft Access 数据库的 .mdb 文件的名称和路径。 Set the property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性 在设计时显示与控件占位符中的控件关联的访问数据文件的名称和路径。The following code example shows how to use the property to display the name and path of the Access data file that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetConnectionString() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetConnectionString () As String

summary.span: 为与此设计器关联的控件获取在设计时有效的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

returns.span: 对于关联的 ， 包含其设计时连接。

span.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件的 属性映射到设计器站点，然后使用 控件的属性生成连接字符串。The method maps the property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the property of the control to generate the connection string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法 在设计时显示与控件占位符中的控件关联的 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。The following code example shows how to use the method to display the connection string of the Microsoft Access database that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 由设计器用于在“属性”网格中添加或移除属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法，使用 设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 " **属性** " 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid. 对于 控件， 方法创建设计时 属性以隐藏 控件的属性。For the control, the method creates the design-time property to shadow the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，使 属性在 **属性** 网格中处于只读和可见。The following code example shows how to override the method to make the property read-only and visible in the **Properties** grid. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)]

para.span: 重写 方法以向设计时属性集合添加属性或更改其特性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to the design-time property collection or change their attributes.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器
